headline: This housing market cycle is so unique that even Warren Buffett broke his own rules to make money on it
summary: As he nears retirement, the Oracle of Omaha’s Berkshire Hathaway has exited its D.R. Horton stake while holding on to its positions in Lennar and NVR.
